about_the_game:
Through forsaken groves and drowning skyscrapers, Resolutiion’s soundscapes cover the calm, the storm, and everything in between. Melancholic vibes and extensive synths alternate brutish beats and industrial riffs: Alice in Wonderland meets Blade Runner.

These 57 tracks by artist and composer Gerrit Wolf are split across two records, each with their own distinct character.

“Ambient” encapsulates the mesmerizing moments of a new, emerging world: foreign strings vibrate from the ocean floor while a floating city’s engines exhale soothing white noise.

“Assault” is where the claw strikes the sword. Enemies clash, and their energy transforms into a rhythmic thunder of electric noise, drums, and violent guitars.

The only way out is to dance.
